title: Holesky: State download starts after genesis
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.13.2-stable`
Git Commit: dc34fe8291bfcaefbce97f559e9610beffb2e470
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.21.1
Operating System: darwin
GOPATH=
GOROOT=

CL client & version: Nimbus v23.9.1
OS & Version: macOS 14.0 Sonoma (23A344)

#### Expected behaviour

Genesis should work

#### Actual behaviour

- State download via snap sync is started only after the chain is already operating.
- `Beacon backfilling failed                err="retrieved hash chain is invalid: missing parent"` errors are spammed every slot
- Nimbus reports optimistically synced / Geth doesn't reply `VALID` on engine


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

1. Clear Geth and Nimbus data directories
2. `geth --holesky --log.vmodule='rpc=5' --state.scheme path`
3. `build/nimbus_beacon_node --data-dir="$HOME/Downloads/nimbus/data/holesky" --network=holesky --rest --tcp-port=9010 --udp-port=9010 --history=prune --el=http://127.0.0.1:8551 --jwt-secret=/Users/etan/Library/Ethereum/holesky/geth/jwtsecret --log-level=DEBUG`


#### Backtrace
[holesky-geth-fail.txt](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/files/12749247/holesky-geth-fail.txt)
